headline: PPL Capital Funding, Inc. announces proposed private placement of $1 billion of Exchangeable Senior Notes
summary: PPL Capital Funding, Inc. ("PPL Capital Funding"), a wholly-owned subsidiary of PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL), announced today that it intends to offer, subject to market conditions and other factors, $1 billion aggregate principal amount of its Exchangeable Senior Notes due 2030 (the "notes") in a private placement (the "offering") to persons reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act"). PPL Capi
